summary: CM Free Time is a quest that if selected will prevent miscellaneous quests from activating automatically by quest givers through random encounters, couriers, mercenaries, etc.
descriptionHtml:
CM Free Time
============

CM Free Time is a quest that if selected will prevent miscellaneous quests from activating automatically by quest givers through random encounters, couriers, mercenaries, etc. Now you can hunt, collect ingredients, craft, look for treaure, clear out dungeons, explore, or just take a walk to enjoy the scenery without having your Quest Log fill up with miscellaneous quests. Truly enjoy your free time without the pressure of more and more items being added to your To Do list. 
 
The Free Time quest automatically activates at the beginning if a new game is started or at the time a saved game is loaded for the first time. All you need do is select the quest and set out to seek your own adventure.  You will still be able to accept and complete main and side quests, as well. So schedule some Free Time and just enjoy adventuring for a change.  


Recommended Mods
================

- AskFollowerSkills - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10675
- CM New Companions Mod - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11669
- CM Companion Level Mod - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13790
- Multiple Followers - http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1345602-wiprel-multiple-followers/
- Live Another Life - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9557


Installation Requirements for Version 1.0
=========================================

Official Skyrim patch 1.5 or greater.

Download and install using one of the following methods.  


Installation - Nexus Mod Manager
================================

Use the \"Download with Manager\" button on the CM Free Time page at Skyrim Nexus and activate after download. 


Installation - Wrye Bash BAIN
=============================

Drop the CMFreeTime.esp into your Skyrim Mods\\Bash Installers folder, and then activate.


Installation - Manual
=====================

Drop the CMFreeTime.esp and scripts folder into your Data folder.


Uninstall
=========

If you used a mod management program, use it to uninstall. Otherwise delete CMFreeTime.esp from the Data folder.  


Load Order
==========

Load order will not make any difference.


Incompatible Mods
=================

CM Free Time should not conflict with any other mod.        


Known Issues
============

None.


Sources
=======

Bethesda Forum discussions: http://forums.bethsoft.com/forum/184-the-creation-kit/

The Creation Kit Wiki Tutorials - http://www.creationkit.com/Category:Tutorials

The Creation Kit - Steam download listed under Tools.


Licensing and Legal
===================

CM Free Time was created by Cutthroat Mods and is furnished as is without promises or guarantees to be bug free or conflict free.  Any bugs inherent in the game engine or Creation Kit are not the responsibility of Cutthroat Mods.  

Do not upload this mod to any website without permission from Cutthroat Mods.  Uploads to Steam Workshop are not permitted and will never be approved.  Translations into other languages are permitted  provided this Readme is included as is in English along with any translated versions.  Translated files can be uploaded to any website except Steam Workshop.  Permissions to do translations are not required.  If you have any questions or concerns please send email to cutthroatmods@hotmail.com. 


Revision History
================

Version 1.0 - Initial release.
